title: My Pixel 4 XL says "Can't find valid operating system after update
content:
I am currently deployed and after performing an update my Pixel 4 XL states "Can't find valid operating system." How do i go about fixing this issue. I have my Pixel 3 XL and it is working fine with the new update. What steps do I need to go through to get this resolved is this some that you at Google can fix or do I have to go through Verizon.
I look forward to your reply.
